columns.name: THREAD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: This is the list of all the users who have sent messages on this conversation. This is used for display (with the display name column) and searching.

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
